Content.Text:
One chilly winter day, as you leafed through your
mail, a simple pamphlet caught your eye.
<PAGE>
"New Farmers Wanted! Join us and help Oak Tree
Town grow as you work the land!"
<PAGE>
Wouldn't it be interesting to become a farmer?
To leave city life behind and live off the land, in
harmony with nature?
<PAGE>
With visions of green pastures and friendly
animals in your head, you filled out and
submitted the application.
<PAGE>
One week ago, the reply came. You'd been
accepted!
<PAGE>
Now, a new life awaits you in the countryside...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN> Please, come in.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Ah, you must be the applicant for the vacant
farmer position. Er...
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, was it?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<NAME_UNKNOWN><WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Welcome to <BLUE>Oak Tree Town.</BLUE> We're so glad you
decided to come.
<PAGE>
I am <BLUE>Veronica</BLUE>, the Guild Master. It's a pleasure
to meet you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
The Guild office manages the day-to-day
operation of Oak Tree Town.
<PAGE>
We handle a multitude of duties here, such as
running town events and posting job openings.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>It's also our job to welcome you as our town's
newest farmer.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>We received many applications, but of course,
we had only one opening. We kept coming back
to your application...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R><FACE_LAUGH>because we could feel the honesty and passion
you possess. Eventually, we decided you would
be the best fit.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I know you've come a long way to start your
new life as a farmer...
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>But I'm afraid we've still got some work to do
setting up your farm.
<PAGE>
So, until the farm is ready for you to move into,
I'm going to have you stay with another farmer
for training.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Don't worry. She's the nicest, gentlest old lady
you could ever meet.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Any questions? No? Well then, allow me to walk
you to her farm.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
All right, <MYNAME>. Here is where you'll learn
all about what it takes to be a farmer.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>My, my! Why hello there, Miss Veronica.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>And who is this you've brought with you?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
This is the new farmer that we talked about last
week.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
<NAME_UNKNOWN>Oho! And such a spry-looking youth, too!

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, allow me to introduce you. This is
Madam <BLUE>Eda</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
She has run this farm for many years, and you'll
benefit greatly from her guidance and
experience.
<PAGE>
The milk from her farm has swept up blue
ribbons from a hundred county fairs.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
My, my! Flattery will get you everywhere, hoho!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, was it? It's a pleasure to meet you.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now then, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Madam Eda will instruct you in the finer points
of raising crops, tending to animals and all the
other chores that come with being a farmer.
<PAGE>
This is just until your own farm is ready. That
should be in about a week.
<PAGE>
Until then, Madam Eda has graciously offered to
let you stay as a guest in her house.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
I'd be glad to have you, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, I'm afraid I have other work to attend to.
May I leave the rest in your hands, Madam?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Of course.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, Madam Eda has been a farmer for
decades, so be sure to take advantage of all her
knowledge.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Should you need any other help, or assistance
with getting settled, you're welcome to come by
the Guild anytime. Now, if you'll excuse me...

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Well then, what kind of host would I be to leave
you standing out here in the cold? Would you
like to come in?

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hohoho. Come in, come in!

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This is my home. And even though it's just for a
few days, think of it as your home, too.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hm? I look happy?
<PAGE>
Why, of course! Ever since my grandson moved
back to the city, I've been living in this old house
all by myself.
<PAGE>
With you here, it's almost like he's home for a
visit. I'm glad to have the company.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
You must be exhausted from the trip here. Let's
wait until tomorrow to start working.
<PAGE>
Why don't I show you to your room? This way,
dear.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
This will be your room. Now, let me explain
what you can do with all the furniture you see
here.
<PAGE>
First is your <BLUE>Toolbox</BLUE>. You can store tools like
hoes and sickles in here.
<PAGE>
Stand next to it and <BLUE>press the A Button</BLUE> to use it.
<PAGE>
You can leave things in your bag, of course, but
if you won't be using them soon or just need to
free up space, stow them here.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Next is your <BLUE>Storage Box</BLUE>. You can keep items,
insects and other collectibles in here.
<PAGE>
You use it the same way as the Toolbox, by
standing next to it and <BLUE>pressing the A Button</BLUE>.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
That brings us to the <BLUE>Bookshelf</BLUE>. Here, you can
look up info on all the things you learn how to
do on the farm.
<PAGE>
As with the Toolbox and Storage Box, stand
next to it and <BLUE>press the A Button</BLUE> to use it.
<PAGE>
People in this town are fond of giving
educational books, so always be sure to read up
to refresh what you've learned.

<FACE_EDDA><POS_LEFT><FACE_SAD>
Good gravy, look at the time! You must be tired
and here I am, plumb talking your ear off.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Go ahead and sleep in this <BLUE>bed</BLUE> here. Just stand
next to it and <BLUE>press the A Button</BLUE> to turn in for
the night.
<PAGE>
I still have a few chores to finish, so don't wait
up for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, one last thing. What do you think about
keeping a journal of your life here?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Writing in your journal helps you remember what
you've been doing. I do it before bed, but you
can jot down your progress anytime.
<PAGE>
And before I go, here's a small allowance from
me. Use it to get whatever you might need.
<PAGE>
Good night.
Today was exhausting. I can't wait to crash...

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
The farm where you'll be staying is <BLUE>4 blocks up
the mountain</BLUE>.
<PAGE>
It's a bit out of the way, but it's really a very
pleasant place.
<PAGE>
Shall we be going?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't this a lovely town? It may be a little small,
but I think that adds to its charm.
<PAGE>
That we enjoy the level of prosperity we do is
thanks to everyone's hard work and good
attitude.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
As Guild Master, I'm very proud of our town and
everyone who calls it home.
<PAGE>
I hope that someday you'll come to love it as
much as I do, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh-ho! I'm glad to hear you say so. Well then,
let's make our way up into the mountains.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_LEFT><FACE_NORMAL>
Plenty of people live in town, but set foot
outside it and you'll find yourself surrounded by
lush forests and rivers.
<PAGE>
The richness of the natural world around us is
one of the best things about living here. Would
you mind if we made a small detour?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Isn't this a beautiful river? This clear water and
the rich soil nourish the crops our farmers grow.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Farming aside, isn't it relaxing to sit and listen to
the quiet rush of the water?
<PAGE>
Well then, let's continue on to the farm.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This way, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Are you all right?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
These hills get steep in places. The climb can
tire you out if you're not used to it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Why don't we take a moment to catch our
breath?

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hm? The air tastes sweet?
<PAGE>
Yes, I can see how it would seem that way for
those who have spent their lives in the city.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Nature's beauty is this town's greatest treasure,
and I aim to keep it that way.

<FACE_VERONICA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Shall we continue on? We still have a little ways
to go.
